nodes.text: Trade monarch was the title of the ruler of the planet Neimoidia, homeworld of the Neimoidian species, and its purse worlds of Cato Neimoidia, Deko Neimoidia, and Koru Neimoidia. Senator Lott Dod of the Trade Federation kept in contact with the Trade Monarch via holographic communications within the Federation delegation offices in the Grand Convocation Chamber of Coruscant's Senate Building.
